ygData.subject: To the programmer in charge of trade skills
ygData.msgSnippet: a few simple questions. 1) Is there a third tinkering book on the normal servers? 2) Are there recipes available that are not in the 2 books by the windmill?
ygData.messageBody:
a few simple questions.

1) Is there a third tinkering book on the normal servers?
2) Are there recipes available that are not in the 2 books by the windmill?
3) Are you planning on enhancing this skill in the near future? The Distant
future?

Thank you for taking the time to answer these questions for us. We are a group
of dedicated tinkerers who have been chasing our tails for several months now,
and we are all getting pretty frustrated. Several of us have had numerous
conversations with different GM's. Some have said the skill was broken, others
have said that it works perfectly. If you could shed some light on this
subject we would all greatly appreciate it.

Thank You Again

M. Stokes
AKA
Malkin Fennin Ro
